comments:
Hello,

Below is the call stack for an NPE I get when I click to "versions" button in the plug-ins page and select "force versions" radio. This does not happen everytime. Although I am not sure, one particular thing I noticed, exception is thrown in my features where I have fragments along with plug-ins and plug-ins' current versions in the form of 1.1.1.a

Thanks,
H.Ceylan
